Title: Evaluation of e-kelurahan information systems at subdistrict of pancoran mas depok using technology acceptance model
Source title: Journal of Theoretical and Applied Information Technology
Affiliations: Information System Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Lampouw, Y.F., Information System Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fajar, A.N., Information System Management Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: In an effort to improve the quality of public services, the Government Issues Minister Regulation No. 24 Year 2006 on Guidelines for the Implementation of Integrated Services One Stop. As well as through the Minister of Home Affairs No. 4 of 2010 launched a program called the Integrated Administrative Service Sub-District or abbreviated PATEN. Utilization Implementation of System E - Kelurahan on integrated subdistrict administrative services are expected to boost the performance to support the implementation of good governance, it is necessary for adaptation by the user and the environment in order to obtain optimal results. Methods TAM (Technology Acceptance Model) is used to determine how much influence the perceived ease of use and perceived usefulness in the implementation process System E-Kelurahan Pancoran Mas Depok sub-district. © 2005 - ongoing JATIT & LLS.
Author Keywords: Good governance; Integrated services; Technology acceptance models
References: Ajzen, I., Fishbein, M., (1980) Understanding Attitudes and Predicting Social Behavior, , M Prentice-Hall, Englewood Cliffs, NJ; Davis, F.D., Perceived Usefulness, Perceived Ease of Use, and User Acceptance of Information Technology (1989) MIS Quarterly, 13 (3), pp. 318-340. , September; Fernanda, D., (2011) The paradigm of New Public Management (NPM) As the Framework for Reforms Towards Good Governance (Good Governance) in Indonesia; Ghozali, I., (2005) Applications Multivariate Analysis with SPSS Program. Semarang:Diponegoro University Publishing Board; Jogiyanto, (2003) Information Technology Systems, , Yogyakarta: Andi; Jogiyanto, (2007) Behavioral Information Systems, , Yogyakarta: Andi; Effect of Interests Attitudes toward the Actual Use of Information Technology Acceptance Theory Approach Model (2012) Profit, 6 (1); Sanjaya, I.P.S., Effect of Benefits and Ease on Behaving Interests (behavioral intention) In the use of the Internet (2005) Performance 9 things, pp. 146-156; Afrial, R.J., Quality of Public Services Sub-district after the Change Position and function as the regional district head (2009) Administration and Organizational Science Journal, 16 (2), pp. 87-95. , May-August; Rizky Fajar, M., PATENT Policy Implementation (Integrated Administrative Service Subdistrict) in Efforts to Improve Quality of Public services (Study on e-ID services in the District of Krian, Sidoarjo regency) (2017) Journal of Public Administration (JAP), 2 (11), pp. 1-6
